metadata.h1: The 2025 Olive Garden Dinner Menu? Every Entrée & Price! 🍝
metadata.description: Ready for dinner at Olive Garden? 🍝 Explore the 2025 dinner menu, with prices on every entrée from Chicken Alfredo to Lasagna. Plan your feast! 👇

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Dinner at Olive Garden is an EVENT. We're talking unlimited breadsticks, that famous salad, and plates of pasta that feel like a warm hug. 🤗 The star of the show is often the legendary Chicken Alfredo—it's creamy, it's dreamy, and it's everything you want in a comfort food classic. Let's explore all the amazing entrees on the 2025 dinner menu! 🔥

items.question: Can I get lunch-sized portions for dinner?
items.answer: Usually, the lunch-sized portions are a weekday, pre-3 PM deal. But hey, it never hurts to ask your server nicely! Some locations might be cool about it. 😉

items.question: What are the best gluten-free dinner options?
items.answer: You've got options! Olive Garden offers gluten-free rotini pasta you can get with marinara or meat sauce. Plus, they can modify other dishes. Just let your server know you're eating gluten-free!

items.question: Does Olive Garden have family dinners?
items.answer: YES! They have awesome Family-Style Meals that serve 4-6 people. You can get giant trays of Chicken Alfredo, Lasagna, and more. It's perfect for a night in with the whole crew. 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
